Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS
REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Relates to the fermented juice of grapes being considered cider
Summary: Establishes that the definition of cider shall include the partially or fully fermented juice of fresh grapes.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the alcoholic beverage control law, in relation to the definition of cider including the partially or fully fermented juice of fresh grapes
